snippet: The Bears moved into a tie for first place in the N.F.C. North as Josh McCown threw for four touchdowns and ran for another.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Chicago Bears rout Dallas Cowboys, 45-28, to grab a share of the NFC North lead; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Bears moved into a tie for first place in the N.F.C. North as Josh McCown threw for four touchdowns and ran for another.

headline.main: McCown Hot on Cold Night, And Bears Thump Cowboys
headline.print_headline: McCown Hot on Cold Night, And Bears Thump Cowboys
